entries.title: Annual Report - Central Bank of Cyprus
entries.text: The Annual Report includes a short analysis of economic developments, a description of the CBC's functions as well as the Financial Statements.

entries.title: Financial Stability Report - Central Bank of Cyprus
entries.text: The purpose of this analysis is to promote awareness of issues that are relevant for safeguarding the stability of the Cyprus financial system.

entries.title: Working Papers - Central Bank of Cyprus
entries.text: This paper presents updated estimates of short-run elasticities for the fiscal variables that depend upon the economic cycle for Cyprus.

entries.title: Monetary Policy Report - Central Bank of Cyprus
entries.text: The MPR appeared about eight times a year and contained an overview of current domestic and international economic developments.

entries.title: External Statistics - Central Bank of Cyprus
entries.text: The external statistics include data on balance of payments, international investment position, external debt and foreign exchange reserves.

entries.title: Statistics - Central Bank of Cyprus
entries.text:
The Central Bank of Cyprus, as a member of the European System of Central Banks (ESCB), collects, compiles and disseminates a wide range of statistics

entries.title: Working Paper 2008-1: Imperfect Central Bank Communication
